displayName.text: Daniel E Jacobs D.M.D. FAGD- Central Park South Smile Design

formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S # 7C, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S # 7C, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: There aren’t enough positive things I can say about Dr. Jacobs. I went to him after my previous dentist let my mouth go to s***. Dr. Jacobs did a thorough review and calmly took control of my situation. He sent me to a periodontist and root canal specialist and talked me down from the ledge when I panicked (which I can easily do when it comes to medical stuff). Dr. Jacob’s ability to be professional and kind is what I value most. I also appreciate that he is not looking to get rich off of me, but rather find the best solutions for my needs. For a year, he oversaw my journey back to a healthy mouth, then began his work, which was meticulous. He was not happy till it was perfect. Today my mouth is healthier than it’s been in a decade, and I can smile with confidence again. Thanks to Dr. Daniel Jacobs.

originalText.text: I've been a patient of Dr. Jacobs since 2018 and I have had a lot of anxiety about "the dentist" since I was young. Dr. Jacobs is personable, professional and communicative. He has always taken the time to explain things simply and answer my plethora of questions when I have them. My hygienist, Alyssa, I have just as much trust as she's cleaning my teeth doing the more tedious part of my visit - I leave feeling grateful of her care of my gums and teeth. Last but certainly not least is the receptionist, Odette. As good or bad experiences I've had at any medical office, the person who I interact with before and after my visit sets up and leaves a lasting impression - Odette is beyond great at her job. She is the person anyone would want in the "front of the house", not only organized giving the practice a great reputation but also personable, remembering details about you as a patient (in person as well as on the phone), and caring about your experience. It's clear Dr. Daniel Jacobs' practice works as a team.

originalText.text: I've been a patient at this practice for over 20 years and Dr. Jacobs is carrying on the tradition of quality started by his predecessor Dr. Mandor. The practice continues to be expertly managed by Odette (clear, timely communication and scheduling and always working to provide care when needed, especially in emergencies) and Alyssa is a phenomenal hygienist--gentle but thorough, efficient and warm. Dr. Jacobs chair-side manner is equally warm and he communicates throughout procedures to tell you what's coming and how much longer he'll be working. He's very current on best practices and in intervening in the best way for each patient. He fitted a crown for me expertly, quickly and the result is something I don't know is in my mouth, all with no pain and minimal discomfort at any point during the procedure. Cannot recommend this practice more highly.

originalText.text: I was recently referred to Dr Jacob's at Central Park south smile by a trusted friend. I am Beyond grateful he gave me Dr. Jacobs name. From the first call to make an appointment with Odette, I felt so comfortable and cared for. They scheduled me right away and when I got To the office I had Zero wait time. Eileen and Dr. Jacobs were so gentle and kind, and walked me through the entire process. There wasn’t a second where I felt Uncomfortable or unsure of what was happening. Dr. Jacobs (and the whole staff) has amazing bedside manner and you can tell care a great deal about their patients. The work itself- didn’t feel a thing! Dr. Jacobs has incredibly gentle hands and made what could have been a very painful procedure essentially seamless. I cant Thank them enough for the help they’ve given me- I would HIGHLY recommend.

originalText.text: Dr. Jacobs is the best dentist I have ever been to in NYC. At the risk of sounding immature, I must admit that I used to have severe anxiety before going to the dentist. It is something I could not get over since having a less than amazing experience as a child at a mediocre practice. I let Dr. Jacobs know I hated going to the dentist so much that I even panicked the night before. I quickly realized that there was no need for this overwhelming anxiety anymore once I met Dr. Jacobs. He is extremely professional, kind-hearted, and really cares about his patients. He uses methods that eases injections when necessary, and miraculously I never feel any pain when I am getting work done (cleaning, filling, cap for root canal, you name it!) at the hands of Dr. Jacobs. If you want a professional, kind, welcoming, knowledgable, and delicate dentist that will get the work done virtually pain and stress free... Dr. Jacobs is the ONLY dentist to see!
